note.p: Birth: Stoke Newington, London, England (19 February 1841)

Career: Assistant Chemist, School of Mines, London (1860-1871); Professor of Experimental Science, Royal Indian Engineering College, Cooper's Hill (1871-1901); collaborated with Lord Robert Cecil (FRS 1868) at Hatfield House; Honorary Director, Royal Society Catlaogue of Scientific Papers
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1924 vol 105 pp x-xi signed by T E T
